Firuze wrote:

> The guilty party here is composed by Barbara Sheridan and Miss Behavin *points at both* and their deliciously funny Mibu Times/Dispatch. I found that to understand certain jokes I had to know about PMK, so I decided to download several episodes. Since then, I'm lost in addiction. *wails*>>
>
It's certainly not *our* fault that we stumbled upon a stack of old 
newspapers and decided to share them is it????? *tries to contain mad 
laughter* And besides as far as addictions go there are worse ones 
*cough* soba *cough*.

>A wave of sadness enveloped me over the past weekend, after I saw episode 23, since it announced that next one would be the ending. Is there any news on any kind of continuation?>>
>
*Sigh* the raw version came out last night and as far as I know that's 
the end of that. However iI don't see why they can't give us a couple 
extra  movies---but please Dear Kami don't let it be anything like the 
dreaded RK Seishounen (sp?)

Is there any place where I can read/download scanlations/translations of 
the manga? >>

The first 2 or 3 volumes have been done and I believe it's on 
fifay.net   You should be able to find it by Googling

And here's a wee something that might cheer you up because it seems that 
Hijikata and company were sent on a little undercover assignment....

http://www.shinsengumihq.com/prom.htm
